mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.name AS itemName,b.original_price AS originalPrice,b.kill_price AS KillPrice,b.img_url AS imgUrl, ( CASE WHEN (now() BETWEEN a.start_time AND a.end_time AND a.total > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS canKill FROM item_kill AS a LEFT JOIN item AS b ON b.id = a.item_id WHERE a.is_active = 1

SELECT a.*, b.name AS itemName,b.original_price AS originalPrice,b.kill_price AS KillPrice,b.img_url AS imgUrl, ( CASE WHEN (now() BETWEEN a.start_time AND a.end_time AND a.total > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS canKill FROM item_kill AS a LEFT JOIN item AS b ON b.id = a.item_id WHERE a.is_active = 1 AND a.id= #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE item_kill SET total = total - 1 WHERE id = #{killId}
UPDATE item_kill SET total = total + 1 WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
